mapper.select: SELECT RU.USER_NO AS userNo ,RU.STATUS AS status ,U.NICKNAME AS nickName FROM KUKOKUK_TWENTY_ROOM_USERS RU JOIN KUKOKUK_USERS U ON RU.USER_NO = U.USER_NO WHERE RU.USER_NO = U.USER_NO AND RU.TWENTY_ROOM_NO = #{roomNo}

SELECT TWENTY_ROOM_NO AS roomNo ,CORRECT_ANSWER AS correctAnswer ,STATUS AS status ,WINNER_NO AS winnerNo ,GROUP_NO AS groupNo ,IS_SUCCESS AS isSuccess ,TRY_COUNT AS tryCnt
FROM KUKOKUK_TWENTY_ROOMS WHERE TWENTY_ROOM_NO = #{roomNo} AND STATUS NOT IN('COMPLETED', 'STOPPED')

SELECT TWENTY_ROOM_NO AS roomNo ,CORRECT_ANSWER AS correctAnswer ,IS_SUCCESS AS isSuccess ,TRY_COUNT AS tryCnt ,STATUS AS status ,CREATED_DATE AS createdDate ,UPDATED_DATE AS updatedDate ,GROUP_NO AS groupNo ,WINNER_NO AS winnerNo FROM KUKOKUK_TWENTY_ROOMS WHERE GROUP_NO = #{groupNo} AND DATE(CREATED_DATE) = CURDATE() ORDER BY CREATED_DATE DESC LIMIT #{limitCnt}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO KUKOKUK_TWENTY_LOGS (USER_NO, TWENTY_ROOM_NO, TYPE, MESSAGE) VALUES (#{userNo}, #{roomNo}, #{type}, #{content})
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM KUKOKUK_TWENTY_LOGS WHERE TWENTY_ROOM_NO = #{roomNo}
